title: Bryan & Michael Voltaggio: Meet the Authors
itunes:subtitle: In their much-anticipated debut cookbook, chefs Bryan and Michael Voltaggio of Bravo’s "Top Chef" explore the concept of family by crafting stories illustrated by ingredient-driven recipes, personal experiences, and modern perspectives on food.
itunes:author: iBooks
